articles.title: Brazil's Bolsonaro Gets 27 Years for Coup Plot
articles.summary: Former Brazilian president **Jair Bolsonaro** was convicted of plotting a coup after losing the **2022 election**, receiving a **27-year prison sentence**. This marks the first time a **Brazilian president** has been convicted for attacking democracy, though the ruling wasn't unanimous with **Justice Fux** dissenting.

articles.title: Charlie Kirk Murder Puts Public Leaders on Edge
articles.summary: The murder of **Charlie Kirk** represents the latest violent act targeting **public-facing leaders**, creating heightened security concerns across political and business spheres. The incident has prompted **Fortune** executive editorial director **Diane Brady** to examine the growing threats facing prominent figures in today's polarized environment.

articles.title: Warner Bros Discovery Soars 37% on Paramount Bid
articles.summary: **Warner Bros. Discovery** stock surged **37%** following reports that **Paramount Skydance** is preparing a mostly cash takeover bid. The potential merger would create another media giant, with **WBD shares** jumping over **60% year-to-date** while **Paramount** gained **10%** on the news from **Wall Street Journal**.

articles.title: Israeli Operation Derails Middle East Peace Talks
articles.summary: An **Israeli military operation** disrupted crucial peace negotiations between **Qatar's prime minister** and **Hamas negotiator Khalil Al-Hayya** on Monday. The meeting, held under **Qatar's** flag, was addressing a new **US ceasefire proposal** that could have ended the nearly **two-year conflict** in the region.

articles.title: Epstein Ties End UK's Mandelson Political Career
articles.summary: **Peter Mandelson**, known as the **UK's 'Prince of Darkness'**, faces political downfall due to revealed connections with **Jeffrey Epstein**. The scandal has effectively ended the career of one of **Britain's** most influential political operators, who previously served in multiple cabinet positions and shaped **Labour Party** strategy.

articles.title: OpenAI Gets Microsoft Approval for Profit Structure Change
articles.summary: **OpenAI** secured **Microsoft's** blessing to convert its for-profit arm into a **public benefit corporation**, according to board chairman **Bret Taylor**. The nonbinding agreement allows the **AI startup** to raise additional capital and potentially go public, pending approval from **state regulators** for this significant structural transition.

articles.title: NASA Bans Chinese Scientists Amid Space Race Tensions
articles.summary: **NASA** has banned **Chinese citizens** with **US visas** from participating in agency programs, dramatically escalating the space race between **China** and the **United States**. This move comes as **China** prepares for a crewed lunar mission, intensifying competition for space dominance between the two superpowers.

articles.title: Belarus Frees Political Prisoners for US Sanctions Relief
articles.summary: **Belarus** released **52 political prisoners** including journalists, activists, and trade union leaders following negotiations between **Alexander Lukashenko** and **President Trump**. The deal involves easing **US sanctions** in exchange for prisoner releases, though over **1,000** political detainees remain imprisoned in the authoritarian state.

articles.title: Hyundai Battery Plant Delayed After Immigration Raid
articles.summary: **Hyundai's Georgia battery plant** faces a **two to three month** startup delay following last week's **immigration raid**, CEO **Jose Munoz** announced. The facility, a joint venture with **LG Energy Solution**, was targeted in the **Department of Homeland Security's** largest single-site enforcement operation in history.

articles.title: Apple Watch Gets FDA Approval for Hypertension Detection
articles.summary: **Apple Watch** will launch **hypertension detection** next week after receiving **FDA approval**, marking a major health monitoring breakthrough. The feature, available on **Series 11** devices, enables continuous blood pressure monitoring without additional equipment, potentially transforming how millions track cardiovascular health through wearable technology.

dailyGreeting: Good morning. Dramatic political shifts shake global landscape today.

historicalEvents.description: Ottoman Empire defeated at Battle of Vienna
Lascaux cave paintings discovered in France
John F. Kennedy marries Jacqueline Bouvier
Steve Biko dies in South African police custody
